column4: this is a bit offtopic but i have been trying ages to get help with this. I am trying to get backtrack on my nokia n900 and cannot find any noob friendly instructions. can someone help please?
ok np, i tried the #backtrack channel but theres only 5 people on their
aye, i got the link lol, thanks for the info
And even if there were only 5 people in #backtrack-linux it wouldn't change the fact that #ubuntu only supports Ubuntu.
